        <div class="header-context group"><!-- deliberately empty --></div>

  <div id="whitehall-wrapper">
      
  <main id="content" role="main" class="whitehall-content"><div id="page" class="organisations-show">
      <div class="organisation hm-courts-and-tribunals-service ministry-of-justice-brand-colour executive-agency" id="organisation_73">

  <div class="block-1 headings-block">
    <div class="inner-block">
      
<header class="page-header"><div class="logo">
    <h1><span class="organisation-logo organisation-logo-stacked-single-identity organisation-logo-stacked-single-identity-large"><span>HM Courts &amp; Tribunals Service</span></span></h1>

  </div>

  <aside class="heading-extra"><div class="available-languages">
    <ul>
<li class="translation">
            <span>English</span>
        </li>
        <li class="translation last">
            <a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service.cy">Cymraeg</a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>

      
</aside></header>
</div>
  </div>

  <div class="block-2 ">
    <div class="inner-block">
      
      <section id="what-we-do" class="what-we-do"><div class="content">
          <h1 class="label">What we do</h1>
          <div class="overview">
            <p class="description">HM Courts and Tribunals Service (HMCTS) is responsible for the administration of the criminal, civil and family courts and tribunals in England and Wales and non-devolved tribunals in Scotland and Northern Ireland. We work with an independent judiciary to provide a fair, efficient and effective justice system.</p>
              <p class="parent_organisations">
                <abbr title="HM Courts and Tribunals Service">HMCTS</abbr> is an executive agency, sponsored by the <a href="/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice">Ministry of Justice</a>.
              </p>
            <p><a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about" id="read_more_link">Read more about what we do</a></p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
</div>
  </div>


    <div class="block-7 heading-block">
      <div class="inner-block">
        <section id="policies"><div class="head-section">
            <h1 class="label">Our policies</h1>
          </div>
          <div class="content">
            <ol class="policies document-list"><li class="policy document-row" id="policy_366838">
      <h2><a href="/government/policies/making-the-administrative-justice-and-tribunals-system-more-effective">Administrative justice reform</a></h2>
      <p class="summary">Actions being taken to make Administrative Justice and Tribunals more streamlined and efficient.</p>
</li></ol>
<p class="see-all">
              <a href="/government/policies?departments%5B%5D=hm-courts-and-tribunals-service">See all our policies</a>
            </p>
          </div>
        </section>
</div>
    </div>

  <div class="block documents-grid">
  <div class="inner-block">
    <h1 class="block-title">Documents</h1>
      <section id="announcements" class="document-block documents-1"><h1>Our announcements</h1>
        <div class="content">
          <ol class="document-list">

      <ul class="attributes">
<li class="publication-date"><abbr class="public_timestamp" title="2014-12-12T00:00:00+00:00">12 December 2014</abbr></li>
        <li class="document-type">Press release</li>
      </ul>
</li>    <li class="news_article document-row" id="news_article_413431">
      <h2><a href="/government/news/new-appointment-to-hm-courts-and-tribunals-service-board">New appointment to HM Courts and Tribunals Service Board</a></h2>
      <ul class="attributes">

      </ul>
</li>
</ol>

        </div>
      </section><section id="publications" class="document-block documents-2"><h1>Our publications</h1>
        <div class="content">
          <ol class="document-list">
<li class="publication document-row" id="publication_485025">
      <h2><a href="/government/publications/charity-appeals-register-of-tribunal-cases">Charity appeals: register of tribunal cases</a></h2>
      <ul class="attributes">
<li class="publication-date"><abbr class="public_timestamp" title="2015-04-02T16:58:00+01:00"> 2 April 2015</abbr></li>

      </ul>

      </ul>
</li>
</ol>

</div>

  <div class="block-10">

      <div class="contact-wrapper">
          <h1 id="org-contacts" class="label">Contact HMCTS</h1>
          <div class="org-contacts">
            <div class="addresses">
              <div class="contact clear-contact" id="contact_2399">
  <div class="content">
    <h2>Find a court or tribunal</h2>

    <div class="vcard contact-inner">

        <div class="email-url-number">

              <span class="type">Contact form</span>
              <a href="https://www.gov.uk/find-court-tribunal">https://www.gov.uk/fin...</a>
            </p>
        </div>


    </div>

            </div>
          </div>

        <section id="freedom-of-information"><h1 class="label">Make an FOI request</h1>
            <ol class="steps">
<li>Read about the Freedom of Information (FOI) Act and <a href="https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request/the-freedom-of-information-act">how to make a request</a>
</li>
              <li>Check <a href="/government/publications?departments%5B%5D=hm-courts-and-tribunals-service&amp;publication_type=foi-releases">our previous releases</a> to see if we’ve already answered your question</li>
                <li>Make a new request by contacting us at:</li>
            </ol>
<div class="org-contacts">
                <div class="addresses js-hide-extra-contacts">
                  <div class="contact clear-contact postal-address" id="contact_2306">
  <div class="content">
    <h2>FOI requests</h2>

    <div class="vcard contact-inner">
        <p class="adr">
<span class="fn">Data Access and Compliance Unit</span><br><span class="street-address">Postal Point 10.31, Floor 10 <br>
102 Petty France </span><br><span class="locality">London</span><br><span class="postal-code">SW1H 9AJ </span>
</p>


        <div class="email-url-number">
            <p class="email">
              <span class="type">Email</span>
              <a class="email" href="mailto:data.access@justice.gsi.gov.uk">data.access@justice.gsi.gov.uk</a>
            </p>
            <p class="contact_form_url">
              <span class="type">Contact form</span>
              <a href="https://www.justice.gov.uk/information-access-rights/foi-requests/make-an-foi-request-online">https://www.justice.go...</a>
            </p>
        </div>


    </div>
  </div>
</div>
                </div>
              </div>
        </section>
</div>

        <section class="corporate-information" id="corporate-info"><h1>Corporate information</h1>
  <div class="corporate-information-block">
    <nav class="group sub_navigation" role="navigation"><ul>
<li><a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/statistics">Statistics at HMCTS</a></li>
          <li><a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/our-governance">Our governance</a></li>
          <li><a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/equality-and-diversity">Equality and diversity</a></li>
          <li><a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/complaints-procedure">Complaints procedure</a></li>
          <li><a href="/government/publications?departments%5B%5D=hm-courts-and-tribunals-service&amp;publication_type=corporate-reports">Corporate reports</a></li>
          <li><a href="/government/publications?departments%5B%5D=hm-courts-and-tribunals-service&amp;publication_type=transparency-data">Transparency data</a></li>
      </ul></nav>
</div>
  <div class="corporate-information-block">
    <h2>Jobs and contracts</h2>
    <nav class="group sub_navigation" role="navigation"><ul>
<li><a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/procurement">Procurement at HMCTS</a></li>
        <li><a href="https://www.civilservicejobs.service.gov.uk/csr" rel="external">Jobs</a></li>
      </ul></nav>
</div>
  <p class="information">
      Read about the types of information we routinely publish in our <a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/publication-scheme">Publication scheme</a>.
      Find out about our commitment to publishing in the <a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/welsh-language-scheme">Welsh language scheme</a>.
      Our <a href="/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/personal-information-charter">Personal information charter</a> explains how we treat your personal information.
  </p>
</section>
</div>
  </div>


</div>
      
    </div>
  </main><!-- report_a_problem -->
<div class="report-a-problem-container">
  <div class="report-a-problem-inner">
    <div class="report-a-problem-content">
      <h2>Help us improve GOV.UK</h2>
      <form accept-charset="UTF-8" action="/contact/govuk/problem_reports" method="post">
        <div style="margin:0;padding:0;display:inline"><input name="utf8" type="hidden" value="✓"></div>
        <input id="url" name="url" type="hidden" value="https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service"><input id="source" name="source" type="hidden" value="inside_government"><input id="page_owner" name="page_owner" type="hidden" value="hmcts"><p>Don't include personal or financial information, eg your National Insurance number or credit card details.</p>

        <label for="what_doing">What you were doing</label>
        <input id="what_doing" name="what_doing" type="text"><label for="what_wrong">What went wrong</label>
        <input id="what_wrong" name="what_wrong" type="text"><div class="button-wrapper">
          <button name="commit" type="submit" class="button">Send</button>
        </div>

        <!--<p>If you have more extensive feedback, please visit the <a href="/feedback">support page</a>.</p>-->
      </form>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!-- end report_a_problem -->
</div>
